data.name: Nitro Type cars cursor for any websites
data.description: Change your website cursors to any of the nitro type cars. This applies to all the websites, not just nitro type. However if you want the "only nitro type" version, you can find it here: https://userstyles.org/styles/182373/nitro-type-custom-cursor-nt-cars-cursor I will be adding more cars to this list. but if you want, you can add your own car in the URL under the list by using the car's ID that you want. Example: https://www.nitrotype.com/cars/208_small_1.png That's car is the "Vapor". The ID is 208.

data.name: Azul style for Rojo
data.description:
Apply a theme that look like the real Azul boardgame to the online Rojo game. You can customize the font, I recommand Lora. You can download it here or add this code to the begining of the code : 
@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Lora:wght@500&display=swap');

data.name: RPGGeek/BoardGameGeek/VideoGameGeek
data.description: A style to improve readability on the RPGGeek, BoardGameGeek, and VideoGameGeek sites. While the site redesign is going on, this style may change frequently.

data.name: Dark Comfort for Weblate
data.description:
Dark UI theme for Weblate

(hosted.weblate.org; translations.vivaldi.com; llamalab.com/weblate)

user.name: R3gi CZ
user.about:
I'm hobby amateur designer from Czech Republic. Here I would like to share UI styles for services I use a lot. I think it's better to share them than just keep them for my personal use. That's all. I hope you'll find them useful.

If you like my work, you can write me some feedback or you can by me a beer ;-)

data.name: Dark Drafts for C++
data.description: A dark theme for sites hosting HTML versions of the C++ standard such as Eelis and timsong-cpp .

data.name: angular.io less intrusive nav on mobile
data.description:
Removes the blue color of the top navigation, making it easier on the eyes.
Also reduces the height to 32px, removes extra icons, and repositions it to the bottom
